overview: Marc Killeen is Chief Operating Officer - New Zealand for Signature Security Group. Marc joined Signature Security twelve years ago as Melbourne Operations Manager. Marc was appointed to the role of General Manager Melbourne/Adelaide in 2001. During his time in the GM role, Marc achieved significant bottom line growth and overall cost reduction through the constant pursuit of giving the customer greater value than expected and by ensuring that team culture was aligned with overall business objectives. In 2003 Marc was appointed to the role of Group General Manager Operations, a position which he held until moving into his current role in 2008.
